Local
=====

Template ID ``local``

Fields
-------

**Required**

====  ======  ===============
ID    Type    Documentation
====  ======  ===============
====  ======  ===============

**Optional**

============  =============  =========  ================================================
ID            Type           Default    Documentation
============  =============  =========  ================================================
executionDir
mailProgram   <class 'str'>             Mail program to pipe email to, eg: 'sendmail -t'
============  =============  =========  ================================================
